divs: Sighting DetailsDear Sirs,this tape I recorded for very limited time when I was goining to my work at Cairo International Airport at year 2001 before I retired at 2005 as Airlines Senior Officer,I always have my Panasonic video camera ,but I was not have it's stable stand in my car in addition I had no time to record more that UFO , I noticed that object in the sky and between the buildings like a solo big glowing star,so I stopped for a while to caught this chance specialy in area very near to the airport about distance of 8 KM only.Thanks Dr.Ibrahim Egyptian Ufologist www.ufo-egyptian-hunter.org
Summary: This is Dr.Ibrahim.....www.ufo-egyptian-hunter.org.....this is the total tape recorded and the tape was miss placed with the big quintity of recorded tapes which recorded by me personally.It was recorded without stable stand .Thanks
